verilog_input.description: input VERILOG file, provide circuit netlist information if it is not included in DEF file

num_bins_x.description: number of bins in horizontal direction

num_bins_y.description: number of bins in vertical direction

global_place_stages.description: global placement configurations of each stage, a dictionary of {"num_bins_x", "num_bins_y", "iteration", "learning_rate", "learning_rate_decay", "wirelength", "optimizer", "Llambda_density_weight_iteration", "Lsub_iteration"}

scale_factor.description: scale factor to avoid numerical overflow; 0.0 means not set

ignore_net_weight.description: ignore net weight larger than some value for weight_hpwl reporting

shift_factor.description: shift factor to avoid numerical issues when the lower-left origin of rows is not (0, 0);

ignore_net_degree.description: ignore net degree larger than some value

gp_noise_ratio.description: noise to initial positions for global placement

stop_overflow.description: stopping criteria, consider stop when the overflow reaches to a ratio

detailed_place_engine.description: external detailed placement engine to be called after placement

detailed_place_command.description: commands for external detailed placement engine

RePlAce_ref_hpwl.description: reference HPWL used in RePlAce for updating density weight

RePlAce_LOWER_PCOF.description: lower bound ratio used in RePlAce for updating density weight

RePlAce_UPPER_PCOF.description: upper bound ratio used in RePlAce for updating density weight

gamma.description: base coefficient for log-sum-exp and weighted-average wirelength, a relative value to bin size

RePlAce_skip_energy_flag.description: whether skip density energy computation for fast mode, may not work with some solvers

random_center_init_flag.description: whether perform random initialization for global placement

init_loc_perc_x.description: initial horizontal location of cells for global placement (% of layout width)

init_loc_perc_y.description: initial vertical location of cells for global placement (% of layout height)

sort_nets_by_degree.description: whether sort nets by degree or not

dump_global_place_solution_flag.description: whether dump intermediate global placement solution as a compressed pickle object

dump_legalize_solution_flag.description: whether dump intermediate legalization solution as a compressed pickle object

node_area_adjust_overflow.description: the overflow where to adjust node area

max_num_area_adjust.description: maximum times to adjust node area

adjust_nctugr_area_flag.description: whether use NCTUgr congestion map to guide area adjustment

adjust_rudy_area_flag.description: whether use RUDY/RISA map to guide area adjustment

adjust_pin_area_flag.description: whether use pin utilization map to guide area adjustment

unit_horizontal_capacity.description: number of horizontal routing tracks per unit distance

unit_vertical_capacity.description: number of vertical routing tracks per unit distance

unit_pin_capacity.description: number of pins per unit area

route_opt_adjust_exponent.description: exponent to adjust the routing utilization map

deterministic_flag.description: whether require run-to-run determinism, may have efficiency overhead

get_congestion_map.description: compute congestion map after placement complete

macro_overlap_weight.description: initial weight of macro overlap cost

macro_overlap_mult_weight.description: weight multiplier for MFP macro overlap

macro_padding_x.description: horizontal padding around macros for MFP macro overlap

macro_padding_y.description: vertical padding around macros for MFP macro overlap

bndry_padding_x.description: horizontal padding around the edges of the floorplan

bndry_padding_y.description: vertical padding around the edges of the floorplan

pin_density.description: target pin density for cells inflation

route_info_input.description: route information file (w. total H/V routing length & macro routing length contribution)

evaluate_pl.description: evaluate .pl file without running anything (e.g., to get baseline PPA)

risa_weights.description: whether use weighted smooth HPWL with RISA net weights
